body_html: @jpeg729 yes you are right, at the moment the schedular will only change the learning rate and not the weight decay parameter... let me see how hard it will be to add that.. but as you can read from the comments above I dont think these changes are going to be accepted so not sure how much its worth investing time on this... I might close this PR soon.

body: @jpeg729 yes you are right, at the moment the schedular will only change the learning rate and not the weight decay parameter... let me see how hard it will be to add that.. but as you can read from the comments above I dont think these changes are going to be accepted so not sure how much its worth investing time on this... I might close this PR soon.
